welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Beaufort, known for its beautiful historic buildings and stunning waterfront views. We invite you to explore and experience all that this charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at County Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at County Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hilton Head Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Hilton Head Airport provides services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lowcountry Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lowcountry Regional Airport handles all freight and shipping operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
